org.maartenjan.xml2

Class XmlDocumentParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.renjin.cran.xml2.XmlDocumentParser

  • public class XmlDocumentParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses XML documents from R code.

    Note that only public methods are accessible from R code.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static org.renjin.sexp.ListVector parse(java.lang.String xml,
                               boolean dtdvalid,
                               boolean noblanks)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Parse an XML document as a string.
        Parameters:
        xml - a string with XML
        dtdvalid - a boolean to indicate if the XML processor should be validating or not
        noblanks - a boolean to indicate if 'ignorable whitespace' should be removed
        Returns:
        an R list with classes xml_document and xml_node
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • parse_html

        public static org.renjin.sexp.ListVector parse_html(java.lang.String html,
                                    boolean noblanks)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Parse an HTML document as a string.
        Parameters:
        html - a string with HTML
        noblanks - a boolean to indicate if 'ignorable whitespace' should be removed
        Returns:
        an R list with classes xml_document and xml_node
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • node_name

        public static java.lang.String node_name(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Returns the name of a document node.
        Parameters:
        node - a document node
        Returns:
        a character string with the name of the element tag (e.g. 'p' or 'html'). For text and comment nodes, this method returns 'text' and 'comment' respectively and an empty string for all other node types.

      • xml_children

        public static org.renjin.sexp.ListVector xml_children(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Returns the child elements of a document node.
        Parameters:
        node - a document node
        Returns:
        an R list of class xml_nodeset

        Parameters:
        node - a document node
        Returns:
        an R list of class xml_nodeset

      • xml_parent

        public static org.renjin.sexp.ListVector xml_parent(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Returns the parent node of a node
        Parameters:
        node - a document node
        Returns:
        a document node which is the parent of node
        Throws:
        org.renjin.eval.EvalException - If node has no parent.

      • xml_attrs

        public static org.renjin.sexp.StringArrayVector xml_attrs(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Returns the attributes of a document node.
        Parameters:
        node - a document node
        Returns:
        a named R list in which the names are the attribute names and the values are the attribute values.
